title: Clutch and brake pedal mechanism required for a rhd 62 splitscreen, could i use any other vw pedal, thanks

posts.content: Vw splitscreen rhd 62 brake and clutch pedal required or information on what else may be used, thanks

A RHD pedal assembly - that could be tricky to find - can't say I've ever seen one for sale - you do get the pedals themselves come up fairly often - not sure if the pedal itself is any different LH/RH drive - I guess all the usual sources FBI etc would be LHD.
I guess the bit under the floor probably is almost certainly different....

Have a look at the online parts catalogs here: and check out a few part numbers.

http://oacdp.org/5867part/367.png

and

http://oacdp.org/5867part.html#q7
Thanks for the info, really struggling to find rhd parts, who could i try with part no, thanks again Adam

DSC_0278.JPG
Can't connect speedo cable as small thread before big thread, any ideas please
